name: SPACE ESCAPE (Indika Wijesooriya)
description:
Your spaceship has just collided with an asteroid with just you in it. You need to pick up your supplies and get the hell out of it before the oxygen runs out. 

Explore the spaceship, find your supplies and get out!

Use ADB or SideQuest to Install the game on your Oculus (Meta) Quest / 2

Developed as a Class Project of Circuit Stream XR Development Course with Unity.
